entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023
